---
title: "API documentation: Sundays"
---

The following functions generate specific Sundays of the liturgical year (type `Sunday`) or Vectors of Sundays for a given liturgical year or year in the civil calendar.



`advent` 

:::{.callout-note appearance="minimal"}
```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
using Lectionary
@doc advent
```
:::
